name: MineScape (itch) (KingOKarma, rainydae)
description:
MineScape

Hoped you like the concept, thanks to the talented artists who worked on the splash art - Taz

And the other one who worked on the UI Claire.

Along with the 3D modelists Dae - https://rainydae.itch.io/ 

and James 

And our Leader Louis.

We had worked on this project together for a work experience and taking a look at what it's like working as a team, as we had never met previously
